You know you're somewhere special when you first approach Sydney by air.
Flying over the Harbor Bridge, past a myriad of boats dancing on the water,...
....the white sails of the famed Opera House below,...
It's a city that seems perpetually on holiday:...
...sailing, swimming, strolling the sunny streets and surfing.
People of Sydney know how to seize the day.
And why not, with this great blue playground embracing the entire city?
As the locals like to say,...
..."There's no better address in the world than Sydney."
